author: Special Correspondent
text: The Dravidar Kazhagam has decided to hold a two-day ‘social justice’ conference in Tiruchi in March, just ahead of the Assembly elections in Tamil Nadu. Significantly, the conference could turn out to be a platform for political forces across the country aligned against the BJP to come together on a common platform. DK president K. Veeramani said DMK president M. Karunanidhi, Congress vice president Rahul Gandhi, Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar and RJD chief Lalu Prasad have been invited to the conference to be held on March 19 and 20.
title: DK to hold ‘social justice’ conference
